Karabo’s question
 Liesl Jobson 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My sister Kifue chases 
 
 rosters that crow. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My brother Katleho has a 
 
 bal to throw. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My cousin Kutloano plants 
 
 seds in a row. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My cousin Kamohelo leans 
 
 on her hoe. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My aunt Keromang has a 
 
 dres to sew. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My uncle Khotso herds the 
 
 catle that low. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mama dries wheat when 
 
 the wind does not blow. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Papa rides a horse over 
 
 mountains in snow. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Grandpa’s slow 
 
 donkey walks to and fro. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Grandma sings songs til 
 
 the fire burns low. 
 
 
 
 What do I do? What do I 
 
 know? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 You know how to say yes. 
 
 You know how to say no. 
 
 
 
 That’s what you do! 
 
 That’s what you know! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Everyone laughs when you 
 
 put on a show. 
 
 
 
 Your work is to play. Your 
 
 work is to grow.
